product_name: Clarks Wave Drift Shoes - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Lace up the women's Clarks Wave Drift Shoes with their premium leather uppers and comfortable rocker sole and enjoy long hikes in the city or countryside. Crafted of premium leather that naturally resists moisture. Innovative curved rocker sole helps you move forward effortlessly and conserve energy; it also absorbs shock and cushions the joints. OrthoLite(R) footbeds cushion each step; they're removable so you can put in your own insoles or orthotics. Synthetic lining; EVA midsole. Clarks Wave Drift Shoes carry the seal of acceptance from the American Podiatric Medical Association. Closeout.
short_description: Lace up the women's Clarks Wave Drift Shoes with their premium leather uppers and comfortable rocker sole and enjoy long hikes in the city or countryside.
